content: Jing-mei's mother, Suyuan Woo, formed the Joy Luck Club in Kweilin, China during a time of war and turmoil. Suyuan, along with three other women, formed the club as a means of escaping the hardships and tragedy they faced, and to bring a sense of joy and optimism into their lives. The club served as a source of comfort and support, providing a space for the women to gather, play mahjong, share their experiences and dreams, and find hope in the midst of difficult circumstances. The formation of the Joy Luck Club in Kweilin demonstrates the resilience and strength of the human spirit, even in the face of adversity.
